source.title: V-JEPA 2: Self-Supervised Video Models Enable Understanding, Prediction and Planning

confidence_rationale: Supports practical dual-channel learning decomposition but lacks explicit commitment-token attribution semantics.

mapping.source_claim_statement: The system uses distinct immediate and rollout objective channels for action-conditioned prediction/planning.
mapping.ree_translation: Partially supports MECH-060 by showing engineering value of split channels, while leaving responsibility boundary formalization under-specified.
mapping.mapping_caveat: Not a direct neural connectome result and does not define attributable commit-boundary tokens.
mapping.source_context: Large-scale machine learning architecture and experiments.

confidence_components.notes: Useful implementation analogy with explicit transfer limitations.
